description:
Let your little ones romp in the snow for hours. The Flurry TPs will keep their feet warm and dry through endless toboggan runs or building the biggest snowman ever.

  • Uppers are water- and wind-resistant polyurethane-coated synthetic fabric
  • Built-in gaiters seal out snow; barrel lock closures let little fingers use them
  • Adjustable Gore™ and Velcro® instep straps fine-tune the fit
  • Inner boots are 6mm Sorel® Thermaplus recycled felt, removable for quicker drying, and washable
  • Midsoles are 2.5mm bonded felt for additional underfoot insulation
  • Outsoles are waterproof thermal rubber shells with traction enhancing multi-directional lugs
name: Sorel Flurry TP Winter Boots - Children to Youths
